overview: Ana, a former actress, gets the chance to reunite herself with a Ophelia, a character she played years back, when she met and fell for the man who is her husband now. However, at this point, her marriage is facing a difficult time. What keeps them together is their 6 year old son. Ana, by becoming Ophelia once again and under these circumstances she suffers a personality split which leads her to an extreme and life changing juncture, something she has never faced before.
title: Los presentes
